ctors.summary: Create an instance of HostingPlatformException with specified message. Mainly reserved for system use.

name: HostingPlatformException
summary: An exception thrown indicating a platform error. Unlike [PlatformOriginalException](System.PlatformOriginalException), this exception doesn't preserve the platform stack. This exception is mainly used by foundation classes as a way to report a platform failure, without exposing the engine internals.
